overview: It's a quiet afternoon. Overhead grey clouds sit motionless spread across an open sky. Down an empty road a young man and woman walk side by side along a pavement. They enter a house, not sharing a word. She beckons him in but he's hesitant.  With a pause he moves in after her. What follows is a moving portrait of shy, faltering desire, revealing fleeting, restrained emotion between two people that do not seem to know each other, and perhaps do not at all want to.
title: An Afternoon
